threats.description: Adversary could take the asset and use it to decrypt data from the database
threats.mitigation: Use a strict directory mode of 750 and file mode of 640 on the file
threats.mitigation_validation: Use the Linux stat command to check the mode matches

threats.description: Adversary could read or tamper with logs causing information disclosure or loss of repudiation
threats.mitigation: Use a strict directory mode of 750 and file mode of 640 on the file
threats.mitigation_validation: Use the Linux stat command to check the mode matches

threats.description: Adversary could delete the file causing a DoS, tamper with the file causing client side security risks
threats.mitigation: Use a strict directory mode of 750 and file mode of 640 on the file
threats.mitigation_validation: Use the Linux stat command to check the mode matches

threats.description: Adversary could spam the service and attempt to cause a denial of service
threats.mitigation: Use service throttling.  Use authentication on the endpoint.
threats.mitigation_validation: Send multiple connections to the endpoint and observe a throttling delay.  Attempt to connect without credentials and observe an "access denied" message.
